activities.description: Choose a machine learning algorithm (e.g., support vector machines). Develop a presentation outline in Chinese, focusing on key concepts, technical terms, and application examples. The AI assistant will help structure the content and provide feedback on clarity and logical flow.

chinese_outline_template.content: 简要介绍机器学习算法（例如支持向量机）及其重要性
chinese_outline_template.pinyin: Jiǎnyǎo jièshào jīqì xuéxí suànfǎ (lìrú zhīchí yàngliàng jī) jí qí zhòngyàoxìng

chinese_outline_template.content: 阐述支持向量机的核心概念，例如超平面、间隔最大化等
chinese_outline_template.pinyin: Chǎnshù zhīchí yàngliàng jī de hēxīn gàiniàn, lìrú chāo fēngmiàn, jiàngé zuìdàhuà děng

chinese_outline_template.content: 列举并解释相关的技术术语，例如支持向量、核函数等
chinese_outline_template.pinyin: Lièjǔ bìng jiěshì xiāngguān de jìshù shùyǔ, lìrú zhīchí yàngliàng, hé hánshù děng

chinese_outline_template.content: 提供支持向量机在不同领域的应用案例，例如图像识别、文本分类等
chinese_outline_template.pinyin: Tígōng zhīchí yàngliàng jī zài bùtóng dìyuán de yìngyòng ànlì, lìrú túxiàng shíbì, wénběn fēnlèi děng

chinese_outline_template.content: 总结支持向量机的优缺点及未来发展方向
chinese_outline_template.pinyin: Zǒngjié zhīchí yàngliàng jī de yōu quēdiǎn jí wèilái fāzhǎn fāngxiàng

example_outline_section.content: 今天我们将介绍支持向量机 (SVM)，一种在机器学习领域广泛使用的监督学习算法。SVM 通过寻找最佳超平面来对数据进行分类或回归，具有很强的泛化能力。
example_outline_section.pinyin: Jīntiān wǒmen jiāng jièshào zhīchí yàngliàng jī (SVM)，yī zhǒng zài jīqì xuéxí lìngyù guǎngfàn shǐyòng de jiānjiū xuéxí suànfǎ. SVM tōngguò xúnzhǎo zuìjiā chāofēngmiàn lái duì shùjù jìnxíng fēnlèi huò huíguī, jùyǒu hěn qiáng de fànhuà nénglì.

activities.description: Rehearse delivering your presentation using formal Chinese vocabulary related to machine learning.  The AI assistant will provide real-time feedback on pronunciation, fluency, and grammar.
